      \hline
    Caron & \v{a} \\
      \hline
    Cedilla & \c{c} \\
      \hline
    Ogonek & \k{a} \\
      \hline

      \hline

      \hline

      \hline
    Eth & \DH; \dh \\
      \hline

      \hline
